title: Introduction of Kuru Family, Raja Bharat and Raja Shantanu
episode_desc: It is an introduction of King Bharata, founder of Bharata race of lunar dynasty. He sows the seed of democratic thinking. Later is story of his successor King Shantanu.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Ganga Kills Her Sons
episode_desc: Shantanu breaks his vow. Ganga explains her act.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Bhishma Is Grown-up
episode_desc: Devavrat is crowned as Yuvraj, heir apparent to King Shantanu. But, to enable his father's remarriage to a village girl, Devavrat vows to remain unmarried for the rest of his life and renounces his rights to the throne.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Bhisma Pratigya/Iccha Mrityu Vardaan
episode_desc: Bhisma gets the Iccha Mrityu Vardaan. With all these sacrifices for Shantanu, do he gets peace.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Amba, Ambika and Ambalika's Introduction
episode_desc: Bhisma action for restoring the image of Hastinapur will lead to his death.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Birth of Pandu, Dhritarashtra and Vidur
episode_desc: Rishi Vyas is introduced and is the father of Pandu, Dhritarashtra and Vidhur. These are imparted knowledge and training by Bhisma and a new king of Hastinapur is selected.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Karna's Birth-story, Dhritarashtra and Gandhari Get Married and Pandu and Kunti Get Married
episode_desc: This is the story of Karna's birth. Marriage Dhritarashtra and Gandhari; and Pandu and Kunti. Introduction of an important character Shakuni.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Madri is gifted to Pandu, Pandu is resting and Sage Kindama's curse on Pandu
episode_desc: Pandu establishes the supremacy of the Kuru House. During his campaigns he takes another wife, Madri. After the campaigns, Pandu goes to the forest for relaxation with his two queens Kunti and Madri.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Dhritarashtra is king his sanyas and Kansa is king and Akashwani about Krishna
episode_desc: While hunting, Pandu accidentally kills a Sage. To do penance Pandu decides to spend his life in exile and entrusts Kingdom to Dhritarastra. In time five children are born to Kunti and Madri. Dhritarastra had a hundred sons from Gandhari.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Birth of Balarama and Five Pandavas
episode_desc: In Mathura, King Kans dethrones his father and takes over. He arranges his sister Devki's marriage with his influential friend Vasudev. But when a Sage predicts Kans' death, he imprisons Devki and Vasudev.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna Janma
episode_desc: Kans personally kills Devki's first six children. Devki's seventh "pregnancy" is taken over by Vasudev's second wife, giving birth to Balram. During eighth child, Vasudev is able to smuggle out the child.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pootna's Death
episode_desc: Gokul is in a festive mood to celebrate the birth of Krishna, unaware of the fact that King Kans has assigned Demon Pootna to kill all the newborns.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna brahmand darshan and Krishna gets caught while stealing makhan
episode_desc: While Yashoda happily reared Shri Krishna in Nandgaon, his real mother Devki, and his father Vasudev spent days inside the prison in Mathura.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Maiya Mori Mai nahi makhan khayo and Kaliya Nag Tandav
episode_desc: Krishna enjoys his times in Nandgaon, showing his divine power time to time.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Radha and Gopikas, protest against Mathura, Devakasur and Trulambasur Vadh
episode_desc: Krishna grows up to an 11-year-old boy. Now he has given up stealing butter; instead he steals the hearts of the young "Gopinis". Radha is one such "Gopini" who has lost her heart to him.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Kansa invites Krishna to Mathura
episode_desc: Kansa came to know about the true identity of Krishna, and invited him to Mathura by faking his repentance.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Kansa vadh
episode_desc: Krishna departs for Mathura. The residents of Mathura have heard of his divine powers and they pay obeisance. Eventually Krishna faces his uncle, Kans.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pandu's Death
episode_desc: Shri Krishna releases King Ugrasen and his parents Devki and Vasudev who had been imprisoned by Kans. Pandu dies in the forest and Kunti returns to Hastinapur with her children.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Satyavati, Ambika, Ambalika take sanyas with Rishi Vyas
episode_desc: Before leaving for Tapovan, Satyavati tells Dhritarashtra to look after the Pandavas. Kauravas and the Pandavas grow up together. Shakuni instigates Duryodhan against the Pandavas and rivalry develops between the Kauravas and Pandavas.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Duryodhan Poisons Bhim and Bhim Gets Strength of 1000 Elephants
episode_desc: Rivalry between Duryodhan and Bheem develops. Duryodhan plots to poison Bheem.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Sudama's chivda and Dron arrives to Hastinapur
episode_desc: Kunti forbids Bheem from saying anything about Duryodhan's attempt to kill him. Vidur suspects something and goes to see Bheeshma. Dronacharya is introduced as one of the teachers of Kuru princes.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Ekalavya, Karna's Education, Arjun's Test of Bird's Eye
episode_desc: Drona trains the Kuru princes in the art of 'Gada Yudh' (Mace fighting). Bheem and Duryodhan specialize in it and exhibit their skills. Drona is specially delighted by Arjun's prowess and he loves him even more than his own son.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Shastra Pooja, Drona insults Karna and Arjun's Test
episode_desc: Dronacharya trains princes in the art of archery and other military skills. Arjun gets poised by his teacher, Duryodhan is often advised to control his arrogance. Shakuni rebukes Gandhari for not seeing through the plots of the Pandavas.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: All grown up, prince is to be nominated and everyone exhibit their skills in Rangbhoomi, Karna challenges Arjun and Duryodhan gives Anga desh to Karna
episode_desc: A special stadium is built to exhibit the feats of the Kuru princes in front of spectators. Members of the royal household are invited.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Drona's guru dakshina to capture Dhrupad
episode_desc: Drona asks for his gurudakshina in the form of captured King Drupad. Pursuram arrives at the Gurukul and gives Shri Krishna his Sudarshan Chakra. He asks Shri Krishna to lay the foundation of a New Yuga (New Era).
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna gets Sudarshan chakra from Parshuram, defeats Jarasandh and orders building Dwarika
episode_desc: Krishna advises the King of Mathura, to shift his capital from Mathura to Dwarka. The Heir to the throne of Hastinapur is to be chosen and Duryodhan is staking his claim while Drona, Vidur and the people of Hastinapur favor Yudhishthir.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Yudhishthir Is Crowned as Prince. Rukmini Is Being Forced to Marry Shishupal
episode_desc: The court meets to name the Heir Apparent to the throne of Hastinapur. Jarasandh asks Bheeshmak to invite Shishupal, the Chedi King, to marry his daughter Rukmani and make Shishupal his ally.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna Kidnaps Rukmini
episode_desc: Shri Krishna has received a letter from Rukmani asking him to take her away from Vidarbha before she is married to Shishupal. Krishna goes to Vidarbha.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Lakshagraha Is Built in Varnavar by Purochan
episode_desc: Duryodhan asks Dhritrashtra to send the Pandav brothers to Varnavat to attend a festival. He threatens to commit suicide if Pandav brothers are not sent to Varnavat.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Tunneling in Varnavat Begins
episode_desc: The Pandavs are suspicious of Duryodhan's eagerness to send Yudhishthir to Varnavat; so they accompany him to Varnavat. Vidur learns that Duryodhan's spies had been collecting wax, oil and other flammable materials in the recent past.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Hidimb Vadh and Bhima's marriage
episode_desc: After escaping from the tragedy, the Pandavas arrive in a forest and rest. Bheem and Arjun want to confront the Kauravas, but Kunti and Yudhishthir decide against it.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Escape from Lakshagraha
episode_desc: Only three days are left for the house of wax to go up in flames and for Kunti and her five sons to burn to death. Vidur informs Pandas of the evil plan and sends them a miner who helps them dig a tunnel to escape.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Dristadyumna & Draupadi Birth and Draupadi Swayamvar
episode_desc: Drupad organizes a grand swayamvar for Draupadi and invites all the princes and brahmins.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Bakasur Vadh
episode_desc: The Pandavas stay in the city of Ekchakra in the guise of Brahmins. Kunti and Pandavas learn of a cruel and terribly strong rakshasa named Bakasur who was harassing the people.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Wins Draupadi and Later She Became the Wives of 5 Pandavas
episode_desc: Without pause or hesitation, Arjun shoots his arrow into the target and wins Draupadi's hand in marriage. Kunti unknowingly asks the five Pandava brothers to share the bride prize.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pandavas Leave from Panchal to Hastinapur
episode_desc: Duryodhan and Shakuni are furious when they learn that the Pandava brothers are alive and that King Dhritrashtra has sent Vidur to call them back to Hastinapur.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pandavas Arrives at Hastinapur and Kingdom Is Divided
episode_desc: The Pandavs return to Hastinapur. Determined to establish peace between the Kauravas and the Pandavas, Bheeshma suggests giving half the Kingdom to Yudhishthir.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pandav Get Khandavprastha
episode_desc: The decision to partition the Kingdom of Hastinapur between the Kauravas and Padavas is not liked by the Pandavas, but Krishna consoles them and tells them that Khandavprastha is their Karambhoomi (field of action).
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Coronation of Yudhirsthir, Khandavprastha Becomes Indraprastha
episode_desc: Ydhishthir knew that the land he was to rule was a barren wasteland, but accepted this injustice because he wanted peace. The Pandavas reach Khandavprastha, and with the help of Krishna and Balram, they renovate the ruined city.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun runs away with Subhadra
episode_desc: To avoid rivalry among pandavas, they had come to a decision to have Draupadi divide her time equally between the five brothers. Once while helping a Brahmin, Arjun had to violate the rule and had to go on a pilgrimage.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Weds Subhadra. Arjun Gets Devdatta Conch and Gandiv and Bhim Gets His Gada
episode_desc: Arjun and Subhadra arrive in Dwarika and are formally married. Arjun, Bheem and Sri Krishna eventually go to Magadh and challenge Jarasandh for a combat. Jarasandh chooses to fight with Bheem.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Jarasandh Vadh, Rajsuya Yagnya begins, Shishupals Story
episode_desc: Bheem and Jarasandh were so equally matched in strength that they fought for nearly fourteen days without rest.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Rajsuya Yagya, Shishupal Vadh
episode_desc: The first honor of Rajsuya Yagna is rendered to Sri Krishna. Shishupal asks, "When there are so many kings gathered in this assembly, why should the first honor be paid to Krishna - a cowherd boy and the son of a servant of Ugrasena?"
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Vyas Predicts War, Draupadi Laughs at Duryodhan
episode_desc: Duryodhan walks around Yudhishthir's 'Maya Mahal" and falls into one of the pools. Draupadi calls him the "blind son of a blind father." Duryodhan, Kama and Shakuni plan to avenge Draupadi for her taunting remarks.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pandavas Go to Hastinapur to Gamble
episode_desc: Dhritarashtra orders Vidur to go to Indraprastha and to invite Yudhishthir to Hastinapur to play dice with Duryodhan. The Pandavs arrive in Hastinapur and pay their respects to the King.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Yudhirshthir Loses Everything in the Gamble
episode_desc: Duryodhan suggests that Shakuni cast the dice for him. Yudhishthir loses his entire Kingdom, his brothers, himself and Draupadi.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Vastraharan of Draupadi
episode_desc: Duryodhan asks his brother Dushasan to bring Draupadi to the assembly hall. Dushasan drags Draupadi to the hall and tries to disrobe her but a miracle occurs.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Pandavas Get Back Everything
episode_desc: Gandhari warns Dhritarashtra that the attempt to disrobe Draupadi would cause the destruction of his lineage. Dhritarashtra gives everything back to the Pandavs.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Re-match of Dyut
episode_desc: Duryodhan threatens to wage war against the Pandavs. When Dhritrashtra forbids him from war, Duryodhan secures Dhritrashtra's approval to entice Yudhishthir to another game of dice.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Vanvas Begins
episode_desc: The departure of the Pandavs upsets Bheeshma, Vidur, Drona and the other elders of the Royal House of Kurus. Vidur advises Dhritrashtra to summon them back. Dhritrashtra rebukes Vidur, so Vidur leaves.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Gandharvas Catch Duryodhan
episode_desc: Gandharvas attack and capture Duryodhan when he teases their princess, but Bhim and Arjun come to aid.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Worships Lord Indra and Lord Shiva for Divyastra and Gets Pashupatastra
episode_desc: After hearing about the Pandav's exile, Krishna goes to visit them. He advises the Pandavs to prepare for war and tells Arjun to do penance to obtain divine weapons.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna's story of one grain of rice, Bhim meets Ghatotkach and Hanuman, Arjun learns dance from Chitrasen
episode_desc: Duruvasa and his followers visit Pandavs. Draupadi is worried as her cooking vessel is empty. In Indralok, Lord Indra advises Arjun to learn dance and music from Chitrasen to help him during his 13th year when incognito.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun gets curse of impotency from Urvashi, Abhimanyus as a kid, Jayadraths head is shaved
episode_desc: In Indralok, Lord Indra limits Urvashi's curse on Arjun to one year during which he becomes an eunuch.Arjun returns from Indralok armed with divine weapons. He accompanies Bheem while they rescue Draupadi from Jayadrath.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Story of Poisoned Water and Yaksha, Abhimanyu Is Grown-up
episode_desc: Jayadrath, Duryodhan's brother-in-law, does penance for kidnapping Draupadi and is rewarded by Lord Shiva. In the forest, the Pandavas plan their 13th year of exile to live incognito and to work in another kingdom.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Agyatvas in Matsya Desh
episode_desc: Pandavas live incognito and serve King Virat. Yudhishthir becomes Kanak, a courtier. Bheem becomes cook. Nakul and Sahadev look after cattle and horses. Arjun becomes Brihannala, an eunuch. Draupadi becomes Sairandhri, handmaiden to Queen.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Karna's curse, Draupadi as Maid Sairandhri rejects Keechak
episode_desc: Karna has assumed the guise of a brahmin and has come a disciple of Parushram. In Virat, Queen Sudeshna's brother Keechak professes his love for Draupadi.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Keechak Vadh by Bheema
episode_desc: Keechak is mad with lust for Draupadi. Draupadi runs to the Virat court, where Keechak angrily kicks her in the presence of Yudhishthir and Bheem. Draupadi reports the matter to Queen Sudeshna and asks Bheem for protection and revenge.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Kaurav Attack Matsya Desh
episode_desc: The news of Keechak's death reaches Duryodhan. He suspects that Bheem is responsible and decides to invade Virat. King Susarma of Trigarta also invades Virat.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Viraat yudh and clothes for Uttara's dolls
episode_desc: Duryodhan and Karna advance into battle. Arjun attacks the Kaurav army and the Kaurav warriors fall unconscious due to his magical weapons. News arrives from the battlefield and King Virat Virat boasts about the glory of his son Uttar.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Abhimanyu's Marriage and Pandavs Decide to Send a Doot to Hastinapur
episode_desc: After the wedding of Abhimanyu and Uttara, Krishna, the Pandavas, Virat and others meet in Virat's assembly. They decide to send an emissary to Hastinapur to seek the restoration of Indraprastha.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Dhritarashtra Does Not Agree and Sends Sanjay
episode_desc: Vidur advises Dhritrashtra to return Indraprastha to the Pandavas. Dhritrashtra refuses to accept the advice. He sends his charioteer Sanjay with a message to Yudhishthir, telling the Pandavs they should spend 12 more years in exile.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Duryodhan gets Narayani Sena from Krishna
episode_desc: In Hastinapur, everyone is nervous when Sanjay returns from meeting with Yudhishthir and his allies.Duryodhan remains adamant about going to war. Shakuni advises Duryodhan to seek Krishna's help.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna took Virat Avtar and Indra takes Karna's kawach kundala
episode_desc: Krishna goes to the court of Hastinapur and suggests peace between Pandavas and Kauravas.But Duryodhan insists that the Pandavas must return to the forest. Duryodhan finds the suggestion unacceptable and threatens to seize Krishna.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Krishna Goes to Hastinapur as Shanti Doot
episode_desc: A war between the Kauravas and the Pandavas looks inevitable but Krishna makes a last attempt for peace. Krishna arrives in Hastinapur.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Karn's Identity Is Disclosed
episode_desc: Krishna's peace mission has failed. Before leaving for Uapplavya, Krishna meets with Karna and tells him to be true to Dharma and not to support sinful Duryodhan.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Vidur Resigns As A Prime Minister, Kunti Meets Karn
episode_desc: Vidur submits his resignation to Dhritrashtra.Kunti worries about the battle to be fought between her sons, Karna and the Pandav brothers. She visits Karna and tells him the truth about his birth.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Sanjay Gets Divya Drishti, Uluk Goes To Pandavs
episode_desc: The stage is set for the Kurukshetra war. Yudhishthir holds a meeting and appoints Dhristadymna as Supreme Commandar of the Pandav army. Vyas visits Dhritrashtra and offers to bestow divine eyesight unto him.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Shikhandi's Story
episode_desc: Shikhandi, who was Amba in a previous life, is anxious for the Kurukshetra war because he wants to fight Bheeshma. Amba swore to take revenge on Bheeshma, so she was reborn as Shikhandi, the elder brother of Draupadi.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Duryodhan Tricks Shalya To Join Kauravs
episode_desc: All the warriors except Balaram and Rukhmi (Rukmani's brother) move towards the battlefield. Balaram remains neutral and both parties deny Rukhmi's help. Duryodhan tricks Salya into joining the Kaurava army.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Worships Devi Durga, Rules Of War Laid
episode_desc: Krishna tells Arjun to seek Goddess Durga's blessings for winning the war. Arjun prays to the Goddess. Krishna drives Arjun to the middle of the battlefield in his chariot.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Kurukshetra War Begins And Arjun Drops His Weapons, Geeta Saar Begins
episode_desc: Arjun refuses to fight and kill his relatives and friends. Krishna advises Arjun to be strong. Krishna's teaching to Arjun at the battlefield form the basis of the "Bhagawad Gita" (the Song of God).
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Geeta Saar Continues
episode_desc: On the battlefield, Krishna continues to talk to Arjun about the importance of following duty. He emphasizes the importance of selfless action without the desire to seek a reward for it.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Geeta Saar Continues And Krishna Shows His Maha Avtar
episode_desc: Unable to satisfy Arjun's hopeless conscience, Krishna grants divine eyesight to Arjun and stuns him with his "Viraat Roop" (divine manifestation).
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Yudhishthir Gets Blessings, Yuyutsu Changes Side And War Begins, Abhimanyu Faces Bhishma
episode_desc: After being blessed by the elders, Yudhisthir goes to the middle of the battlefield and announces that anyone who wants to change sides must do so now.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Uttar Dies, Arjun Faces Bhishma And Day 2 Begins
episode_desc: During the afternoon of the first day of battle, Abhimanyu attacks grandsire Bheeshma and brings down his chariot's flag.As the battle continues, Drona brings down Shristamyumna's flag and Salya slays Uttar, the prince of Virat.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Is Unstoppable, 3rd Day Is Over, 4th Day Begins, Bheem Is Surrounded, 10 Kauravs Are Killed, Krishna Takes Out His Sudarshan
episode_desc: The Pandava army had fared poorly during the first day of battle. Dhrishtadyumna, the commander-in-chief of the Pandavas, devises strategies to avoid a repetition of the first day.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: 9th Day Is Over And 16 Kauravs Are Dead, Bhishma Tells Arjun How To Take Him Out Of The War
episode_desc: Bheeshma tells Pandavas that only a woman could bring his death for he would not raise his hand against a woman. The Pandavas decided to use Shikhandi in their fight against Bheeshma.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Bhishma Lies On The Bed Of Arrows, Karn Meets Bhishma
episode_desc: On the tenth day of battle, Arjun positions Shikhandi in front of him and attacks Bheeshma. As Arjun's arrows pierce his body, Bheeshma smiles.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Day 11, Dronacharya Tries To Capture Yudhishthir But Is Unsuccessful, Shantanu Comes To Bhishma
episode_desc: The Kaurav warriors sit in council and decide to have Drona capture Yudhisthir alive. Drona agrees to the plan after Duryodhan promises that Yudhisthir would not be sentenced to death after he is captured.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Chakravyuh Planned, Duryodhan Promises Susharma
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Abhimanyu Vadh
episode_desc: Yudhisthir learns about Drona's plan to arrange the Kaurav forces in the Chakra-Vyuha. Unfortunately, Yudhistir cannot depend on Arjun for Susarama has lured him away from the battlefield, but Arjun's son, Abhimanyu, offers his assistance.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Vows To Kill Jaydrath And Story About Jaydraths Curse
episode_desc: Arjun kills Susarma the Trigartha Chief and returns to the Pandava camp. He learns about Abhimanyu's death and discovers that Jayadhrath was the main cause of his son's death. Arjun vows to kill Jayadhrath before sunset the next day.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Arjun Breaks Kamalvyuh To Get To Jaydrath
episode_desc: On the battlefield Arjun tells Krishna to take his chariot to Jayadhrath. "There is a wall of Kaurav army between you and Jayadhrath," says Krishna. "I have to break that wall to complete my oath," declares Arjun.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Ghatotkach Dies
episode_desc: Bheem and Hidimba's mighty son, Ghatotkach, joins the Pandvas in the battle. Duryodhan realizes that Ghatotkach must be destroyed and encourages Karna to use his "Shakti" (divine weapon).
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Jaydrath Vadh
episode_desc: Arjun vows to kill Jayadhrath before sunset to avenge the death of his son Abhimanyu. If he is unable to kill Jayadhrath before sunset, Arjun swears he will burn himself to death.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Dushasan Dies And Karn Fights With Arjun, Krishna Puts The Rath In The Land So That Arjun Is Saved
episode_desc: On the battlefield, Dushashan attacks Bheem with his arrows. Bheem remembers what Dushashan had done to Draupadi and the anger blazes within him. Bheem jumps from his chariot and attacks Dushashan.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Dronacharya Dies
episode_desc: Drona spreads fear and destruction in the Pandava army. "If he were to hear that his son, Ashwathama is dead, he would lose interest in life and throw down his weapons", says Krishna.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Shakuni Dies, Yudhishthir Curses All Woman Kind And Duryodhan Becomes Iron Bodied
episode_desc: Kunti visits the battlefield in the middle of the night to grieve over the dead body of her son Karna. Yudhisthir finds her and learns that Karna was his brother.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Karn's Curse, Karn Dies
episode_desc: As the sun rises in the sky the battle between Karna and Arjun begins.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Balram Arrives, Bheem Duryodhan Gada Yudh
episode_desc: The battle between Bheem and Duryodhan begins. The warriors appear equal in strength and skill, but Krishna informs Bheem that Duryodhan could be defeated if he smashes Duryodhan's thighs.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Duryodhan Dies, Ashwatthama, Krip And Kritvarma Remain, Parikshit's Story
episode_desc: Duryodhan commands Ashwathama,new commander-in-chief, to kill the Pandavas. Ashwathama, Kripacharya and Krit Verma arrive at the Pandava camp in the middle of the night as Dhristdyumna and Draupadi's five sons are sleeping.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Yudhishthir Becomes Samrat Of Hastinapur, Bhishma Dies
episode_desc: After the mourning period is over, Krishna leads Yudhishthir to the throne.After the affairs of the state are in order, Krishna takes the Pandava brothers to Bheeshma.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.

title: Dhritarashtra Tries To Kill Bheem
episode_desc: The Kurukshetra war has ended. The Pandavas visit Dhritrashtra who coldly embraces Yudhishthira. Dhritarashtra then moves forward to embrace Bheem, but Krishna tells Bheem to put an iron statue in his place.
show_desc: When differences between the Kaurava and the Pandava clans, who belong to the same family line, lead them to the threshold of war, Lord Krishna decides to step in and take control of the situation.
